title: RoboCop
oscars_won_details: Special Achievement Award for Sound Effects Editing
description: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

title: The Princess Bride
production_studio: Act III Communications, Buttercup Films Ltd.
description: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

title: Full Metal Jacket
description: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

title: Lethal Weapon
description: A veteran police detective is partnered with a younger, reckless officer.

title: The Untouchables
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: During the era of Prohibition in the United States, Federal Agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop ruthless Chicago gangster Al Capone, and because of rampant corruption, assembles a small, hand-picked team to help him.

title: Predator
description: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

title: The Last Emperor
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: The story of the last Emperor of China.

title: Good Morning, Vietnam
production_studio: Touchstone Pictures, Silver Screen Partners III
description: In 1965, an unorthodox and irreverent DJ named Adrian Cronauer begins to shake up things when he is assigned to the U.S. Armed Services radio station in Vietnam.

title: Dirty Dancing
description: Spending the summer at a Catskills resort with her family, Frances 'Baby' Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor, Johnny Castle.

title: Raising Arizona
description: When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives get more complicated than they anticipated.

title: Moonstruck
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Actress in a Supporting Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: A widowed bookkeeper finds herself in a difficult situation when she falls for the brother of the man she has agreed to marry.

title: Broadcast News
description: A talented but neurotic television news producer finds her life and career in turmoil when she falls for a charismatic but dim-witted anchorman.

title: The Witches of Eastwick
description: Three single women in a picturesque village have their wishes granted, at a cost, when a mysterious and flamboyant man arrives in their lives.

title: Beverly Hills Cop II
production_studio: Paramount Pictures, Don Simpson/Jerry Bruckheimer Films
description: Axel Foley returns to Beverly Hills to help Taggart and Rosewood investigate Chief Bogomil's near-fatal shooting and the series of 'alphabet crimes' associated with it.

title: Good Morning, Vietnam
production_studio: Touchstone Pictures, Silver Screen Partners III
description: In 1965, an unorthodox and irreverent DJ named Adrian Cronauer begins to shake up things when he is assigned to the U.S. Armed Services radio station in Vietnam.

title: Evil Dead II
description: The lone survivor of an onslaught of flesh-possessing spirits holes up in a cabin with a group of strangers while the demons continue their attack.

title: The Living Daylights
description: James Bond is sent to investigate a KGB policy of assassinating all enemy spies, and finds himself entwined in a web of arms dealing and international intrigue.

title: Hellraiser
description: A woman discovers the newly resurrected, partially formed, body of her brother-in-law. She starts killing for him to revitalize his body so he can escape the demonic beings that are pursuing him after he escaped their sadistic underworld.

title: Angel Heart
description: A private detective is hired to find a missing person, but the investigation takes a dark and supernatural turn.

title: Babette's Feast
description: In a remote 19th-century Danish village, two sisters take in a French refugee who prepares a lavish meal for them and their community.

title: Radio Days
description: A nostalgic look at the golden age of radio in the 1930s and '40s, as seen through the eyes of a young boy.

title: Withnail & I
description: In 1969, two substance-addled, unemployed actors retreat to the countryside for a holiday that proves disastrous.

title: The Witches of Eastwick
description: Three single women in a picturesque village have their wishes granted, at a cost, when a mysterious and flamboyant man arrives in their lives.

title: The Secret of My Success
description: A young man from Kansas moves to New York City to make his fortune, but he finds that he has to start in the mailroom.

title: Mannequin
description: A young artist, searching for his vocation, makes a mannequin so perfect he falls in love with it. Finding the mannequin in a store window, he gets a job there and his creation comes to life.

title: Adventures in Babysitting
production_studio: Touchstone Pictures, Silver Screen Partners III
description: A teenager's babysitting gig turns into a wild adventure in the big city.

title: Overboard
description: A cruel but beautiful heiress mocks and cheats a hired carpenter. When she gets amnesia, he convinces her that she's his wife.

title: The Running Man
production_studio: TAFT Entertainment Pictures, Keith Barish Productions
description: In a dystopian future, a man is framed for a massacre and forced to compete in a deadly television show.

title: The Lost Boys
description: After moving to a new town, two brothers discover that the area is a haven for vampires.

title: La Bamba
description: The story of the life and career of Ritchie Valens, the first Mexican-American rock and roll star.

title: Near Dark
description: A young man is unwillingly turned into a vampire and joins a nomadic family of the undead.

title: Bad Taste
description: A small town is invaded by aliens who want to harvest humans for their intergalactic fast food franchise.

title: Spaceballs
description: A star-pilot for hire and his trusty sidekick must come to the rescue of a princess and save Planet Druidia from the clutches of the evil Spaceballs.

title: Three Men and a Baby
description: Three bachelors find their lives turned upside down when a baby is left on their doorstep.

title: Wings of Desire
description: An angel tires of overseeing human activity and wishes to become human when he falls in love with a mortal.

title: Hellbound: Hellraiser II
description: A young woman is sent to a mental institution where a sadistic doctor is trying to resurrect her evil stepmother.

title: Au revoir les enfants
description: During World War II, a young boy at a Catholic boarding school befriends a Jewish student who is being hidden from the Nazis.

title: Ironweed
description: An alcoholic drifter returns to his hometown of Albany, New York, after a 22-year absence.

title: Planes, Trains & Automobiles
description: A man must struggle to travel home for Thanksgiving with an obnoxious slob of a shower curtain ring salesman as his only companion.
